item.title: New request form
Request from the Calculator menu
item.description:
a) Go to “Calculator”; b) Select initial entries: date of dispatch, route, container type, container owner, and press “Get rate”;
c) select the rate and press “Make order” You can filter the rates by Point of Destination, Place of customs clearance place and Offers currency d) fill in the fields; fields marked with * are mandatory; and press “Create”.

item.title: New request from template
item.description: Use this feature for your repeating requests with the same details. Step 1. To make an old request as a template: go to “My orders” change to Tablet layout press “Add” make a tag “template” and press Enter or select the tag from the list. Step 2. To create a request based on a template: press “New order” button and select “From template” find the request and press “Repeat” fill in the fields, fields marked with * are mandatory; and press “Create”.
